original_text: These searched for their family records, but they could not find them and so were excluded from the priesthood as unclean.
korean_text: 이 사람들은 계보 중에서 자기 이름을 찾아도 얻지 못하므로 그들을 부정하게 여겨 제사장의 직분을 행하지 못하게 하고

sentences.original_text: These searched for their family records
but they could not find them
and so were excluded from the priesthood
